Package com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.extended

Extra converters that may not be enabled in XStream by default.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActivationDataFlavorConverter
    Converts an ActivationDataFlavor.
    CharsetConverter
    Converts a Charset to a string.
    ColorConverter
    Converts an AWT Color, using four nested elements: red, green, blue, alpha.
    CurrencyConverter
    Converts a Currency to a string.
    DurationConverter
    A Converter for the XML Schema datatype duration and the Java type Duration.
    DynamicProxyConverter
    Converts a dynamic proxy to XML, storing the implemented interfaces and handler.
    EncodedByteArrayConverter
    Converts a byte array by default to a single Base64 encoding string.
    FileConverter
    Converts a File.
    FontConverter
    Converts an AWT Font.
    GregorianCalendarConverter
    Converts a GregorianCalendar.
    ISO8601DateConverter
    A converter for Date conforming to the ISO8601 standard.
    ISO8601GregorianCalendarConverter
    A converter for GregorianCalendar conforming to the ISO8601 standard.
    ISO8601SqlTimestampConverter
    A converter for Timestamp conforming to the ISO8601 standard.
    JavaClassConverter
    Converts a Class to a string.
    JavaFieldConverter
    Converts a Field.
    JavaMethodConverter
    Converts a Method.
    LocaleConverter
    Converts a Locale to a string.
    LookAndFeelConverter
    A converter for Swing LookAndFeel implementations.
    NamedArrayConverter
    An array converter that uses predefined names for its items.
    NamedCollectionConverter
    A collection converter that uses predefined names for its items.
    NamedMapConverter
    A map converter that uses predefined names for its elements.
    PathConverter
    Converts a Path to string.
    PropertyEditorCapableConverter
    A SingleValueConverter that can utilize a PropertyEditor implementation used for a specific type.
    RegexPatternConverter
    Converts a Pattern using two nested elements for the pattern itself and its flags.
    SqlDateConverter
    Converts a Date to a string.
    SqlTimeConverter
    Converts a Time to a string.
    SqlTimestampConverter
    Converts a Timestamp to a string.
    StackTraceElementConverter
    Converter for StackTraceElement (the lines of a stack trace) to a string.
    StackTraceElementFactory Deprecated
    As of 1.4.8, it is an internal helper class
    SubjectConverter
    Converts a Subject instance.
    TextAttributeConverter
    A converter for TextAttribute constants to a string.
    ThrowableConverter
    Converter for Throwable (and Exception) that retains stack trace.
    ToAttributedValueConverter
    Converter that supports the definition of one field member that will be written as value and all other field members are written as attributes.
    ToStringConverter
    Convenient converter for classes with natural string representation.

Package com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.extended Description

Extra converters that may not be enabled in XStream by default.
